name: Rocket Racer (itch)
description:
Your small ship has just escaped the Earth's atmosphere and you're now travelling into the deepest parts of space. Best to watch out for hazards since your little ship can only take so much.

Dodge past the asteroids, push through the nebulas and evade the Alien Spaceships! To see how far you can get in 'Rocket Racer'!

'Rocket Racer' was created in under 30 hours for the UKIE Student 2018 Game Jam.

Controls:

WASD - Moves Ship Around
Q - Boost
E - Shield
R - Filter
P - Pause Game
